title: One Skillet Corned Beef Hash Breakfast

Ingredients.1: 1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL® Mary Kitchen® Corned Beef Hash

Ingredients.3: 0.25 cup finely diced green bell pepper

Ingredients.5: 2 tablespoons canned diced tomatoes and green chiles

Directions.1: Combine corned beef hash, onion, and bell pepper in an ovenproof skillet. Cook, stirring occasionally, over medium-high heat until vegetables begin to soften and hash begins to brown, 10 to 15 minutes. Make 4 indentations in the hash for the eggs. Remove from heat.

Directions.2: Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.

Directions.3: Carefully crack an egg into each indentation. Top with chopped tomatoes.

Directions.4: Place skillet under broiler; broil until eggs are cooked to preferred doneness, 4 to 10 minutes. Check often to avoid burning eggs. Remove skillet from oven. Top with shredded cheese; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
